notes: This program has undergone a major reform effective as of May 1st, 2022.
Students admitted prior to Spring/Summer 2022 should be cautious with fall 2022 and winter 2023 course enrolments, as some compulsory courses were previously coded differently.

If enrolled in an Honours degree, students must add a second study module (second major or a minor), possibly from another faculty. The second module will replace an equivalent number of elective course units.

Fall: 2 elective courses (or 3 if SOC1104 or SOC1301 is deferred to Winter)
Winter: 4 elective courses (or 3 if SOC1104 or SOC1301 is completed this term)

Fall: 1 optional SOC course from: SOC2101, SOC2103, SOC2104, SOC2107, SOC2113, SOC2151, SOC2306, SOC2309, SOC2312, SOC2708 (French only)

Winter: SOC3316 | Advanced Statistics for Social Research

Fall: 1 optional SOC course from: SOC4103, SOC4104, SOC4121, SOC4127, SOC4135, SOC4144, SOC4303
